system.descriptor: In-depth, Academic Knowledge of a group that may be complex or esoteric, providing a depth of knowledge far more than that of Common Lore due to the Experience required to obtain it.
system.uses:
Use: Recall relevent academic information for relevent group. Used for detailed knowledge such as recounting past legends, obscure rulings of the Arbites, Complex Legal Relationships, Identifying rare beasts.
Skill Groups: Archaic, Astromancy, Beasts, Bureaucracy, Chymistry, Cryptology, Heraldry, Imperial Warrants, Imperial Creed, Judgement, Legend, Navis Nobilite, Numerology, Occult, Philosphy, Tactica Imperialis, etc.
